NOOP
===
> Function which does [nothing][nop].

<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var noop = require( '@stdlib/tools/noop' );
```

#### noop()

`Function` which does [nothing][nop].

``` javascript
noop();
// ...does nothing.
```
<!-- </usage> -->

<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var noop = require( '@stdlib/tools/noop' );

function foo( next ) {
	// Do something...

	// Then...
	next();
}

foo( noop );
```
<!-- </examples> -->

<!-- <links> -->
[nop]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NOP
<!-- </links> -->
